Message.Title: question
Message.Msg: is there a way for shorts to collude and take the casino down. look, cmg longs never really sold, still there ping ponging the stock to each other, but einhorn organized those sell offs on earnings so brilliantly. or is this one guarded so well that nothing could be done.

mci worldcom, global crossings and a host of others had a biz model based on a dramatic increase in top line growth but couldn't produce the bottomline numbers. thats how pyramid schemes work, predicated on the future when the eventual requirement is to sell something to everyone in the world in order to satisfy the business model.

Message.Title: ackman and einhorn
Message.Msg: were are you guys? Ackman too busy correcting HLF this week, whats the next target? we need a hedgie to fight the hedgie that owns Amazon. An ability to leverage significant resources to break the pyramid. Takes alot of firepower....billions required.
I am very happy to be a new member.

Yes, cash.... The shorts are forcing bernanke to print more money so that the bot havin momo's can put other peoplez moniez into pumping up worthless stox like nflx, cmg, and amzn to noze bleed valuationz while 'maintaining adequate capital reservez'. The shorts make the bot havin institutionz manipulate the low float stok day in and day out with their nano second bid ask manipulated 100 share block tradez. Then they force to institutionz to write weekly puts and callz systemically killing the retail crack headz that buy this craaaaap every week. Then the shorts are coluding to force bezos and hiz exec palz to unload their optionz, dilute the existing float and cash the fvck out at 200 million of gainz at a clip. The Shorts Secrete Society iz powerful. They are forcing bezos into difficult decisionz that go woth being a 'loss leader' such az switching business stratedgiez every week while operating at a constant money hemoraging rate. Az you can see, thoze nasty shorts did the exact same thing to hastingz at pig flix. He waz very upset az he unloaded hiz free sharez between 220 and 300. Thingz got so bad at Nflx that the shorts made the cfo quit and cash out while the stok waz trading at 220 and forced him az he was preparing to 'spend more time with his family' to say , "dont short my stock". Yes the cfo of nflx was distraugt. Cash, you got it all figured out... Thoze bad mean shorts. Its all of their fault.

Topic.Title: Jump off cliff, and get those 50 million off food stamps for starters:)

Message.Msg: All subsides when extended beyond a very short period cause market inefficiency through inflation on the very items the gvt is tyring to help the poor purchase. It also reduces the need for workers to demand higher wages, which further exaserbates the issue and keeps the low class in the lower class. Minimum wage is also a form of subsidy that has the same effect. The increase in the cost of the items from subsidies (llike food, housing, college, etc..) does not impact the middle and upper class to nearly the same extent, so it is ironic that the very programs intended to help lift people up in the name of fairness, over the long-haul actually make it harder to climb the class ladder. The governemnt (fed+state+local) now spends $54,000 per year per US household and what do we have for it? I'll tell ya - $165k per household in debt and not a lot else!

Message.Title: the ointment on the fly
Message.Msg: If they don't have a very profitable quarter they will have a PE of 5000 with no hope of making it up in the next few quarters. HOw do you reduce the PE IF the current quarter is not a blow out in profits. HINT you don't. Here comes 5000.
Obviously, no one cares about the PE. 3K or 5K, no difference. Ur PE metric is meaningless.
